name: The snake charmer, 500 follower edition
description:
500 follower giveaway...
pencil on paper, risograph, acrylic, watercolour, cm 30x40
Wallpaper is a series of 26 subjects related to ancient images of nudity and circus. It was part of  a project conceived for a site specific exhibition where this series of images was mounted directly on the wall like a unique wallpaper.
Every subject (pencil on paper) was printed in risograph and hand coloured.
